text:
Today you will learn about the nervous system and investigate how fast you react to objects. This will help you understand how Tilly controls her bionic arm.

Learning Objectives

By the end of this activity, you should be able to describe the difference between the central and peripheral nervous systems and how each part contributes to movement.

Do Now

What do you already know about how the nervous system controls movement? Add a text tile in your workspace and answer this question.
